summary.contents: I'm Kevin, a developer which has 9 years of experience in mobile game server development. Additionally, I am a fast learner and quick troubleshooter. I am capable of speaking fluent Korean, fluent Chineses and intermediate English. I will show you my best performance in working if you give me a chance to work with you. I have strong confidence that you won't be regret to work with me.
